snippet: During closing arguments in the eight-week court case, the prosecution said that Kweku M. Adoboli, a former UBS trader in London, had "arrogantly" side-stepped the firm's rules and carried out risky trading activity from 2008 to 2011.
abstract: During closing arguments in the eight-week court case, the prosecution said that Kweku M. Adoboli, a former UBS trader in London, had "arrogantly" side-stepped the firm's rules and carried out risky trading activity from 2008 to 2011.

headline.main: Ex-UBS Trader Accused of 'Playing God' With Bank's Money
headline.print_headline: Ex-UBS Trader Accused of ‘Playing God’ With Bank’s Money
